remarks: Equality of equivalence classes implies equivalence of domain membership.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Jan-1996.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)
statement:
ereldm.1 $e |- ( ph -> R Er X ) $.
ereldm.2 $e |- ( ph -> [ A ] R = [ B ] R ) $.
ereldm $p |- ( ph -> ( A e. X <-> B e. X ) ) $.
